bibl.title: Initiating the Viewer: Deixis and Visual Perception in Alcman's Lyric Drama.
bibl.note: P.M.G. 1 [P. Paris Louvre Inv. E. 3320; Nouveau No. 71 (= M.-P.3 78; LDAB 179)]. - Through complex verbal mechamisms, optical perception in the second part of the Partheneion gets fully dramatized for an audience, thus turning the ritual into an essentially theatrical event.
PEPONI Anastasia-Erasmia, Initiating the Viewer: Deixis and Visual Perception in Alcman's Lyric Drama.
